data.title: Starting Line Physical Therapy and Fitness Hub
data.meta_description: Starting Line is a hybrid facility offering runners in Maine access to one-on-one physical therapy with running specialists, fun and motivating fitness classes, massage therapy, personalized run coaching, and personal training. Don't let injuries get in the way of the activities you love! Our team i
data.meta_site_name: Starting Line Physical Therapy and Fitness Hub
data.text:
Starting Line is a physical therapy clinic and studio gym, that is driven to bridge the gap between injury and performance. Helping you reach your goals is our #1 priority. We are dedicated to preparing runners and active adults for their next “starting line” through physical therapy services, massage therapy, personal training, and group fitness classes that are rooted in education, empowerment, and personalized care.

Portland Maine’s Premier Physical Therapy

Whether you are dealing with an injury or looking to chase your next PR, we are here to navigate those obstacles WITH you. We will meet you where you are and guide you to where you want to go. It is our goal to help you learn the root cause of your problem and the importance of consistent well-rounded training. NOW is the time to discover the care you deserve!

Starting Line welcomes individuals of all fitness levels to push outside of their comfort zone and reach for something new. Our state of the art Woodway Treadmills, high energy group fitness classes, and certified coaches may just be what you’ve been looking for!

You’ve got options to run (or walk!), lift, or do a mix of both. All of our HIIT-style running classes have you going over varying speeds and inclines that will be challenging for beginners and veterans alike. All of our circuit-based strength classes have exercises that allow everyone to workout together while going at their own pace.

Looking for a more individualized plan to reach your fitness goals? Personal training is designed to meet the needs of busy professionals with tricky schedules. Semi-private is designed to help people with accountability while also having the opportunity to workout with others who may share the same goals!

Massage therapy can play a big role in your wellness and even speed up your recovery.

Our licensed massage therapists are trained with a combination of techniques that will help you recover from a hard workout, a stressful desk job, or even the aches and pains you may experience during pregnancy.

As Portland Maine’s Physical Therapy and Fitness Hub, we treat and train active adults all along the athlete continuum. From first time runners (and walkers!) and marathoners to youth athletes, we are here to educate and empower you to reach your goals. Starting Line was founded to provide YOU with the tools to develop smart training habits and discover your inner strength to push beyond your limits.
